Class KMeansClustering

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.model.algorithm.KMeansClustering
public class KMeansClustering extends Object
The KMeansClustering class provides functionality to perform K-Means clustering on a set of delivery points. It leverages the Apache Commons Math library to cluster delivery points into groups, each potentially assigned to a courier for efficient delivery.

This class is particularly useful in scenarios where delivery points need to be distributed among couriers in a way that minimizes travel distance and optimizes delivery routes.

Since:
2024-04-27

  • Method Details

    • predictClusters

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> predictClusters(double[][] data, int couriersNumber)
      Predicts and assigns delivery points to couriers based on their geographical locations using the K-Means clustering algorithm.

      The method clusters the provided delivery points into a number of groups equivalent to the number of available couriers or the number of delivery points, whichever is smaller. Each group represents the set of delivery points assigned to a specific courier.

      Parameters:
      data - a two-dimensional array where each sub-array represents the coordinates (e.g., latitude and longitude) of a delivery point.
      couriersNumber - the number of couriers available to handle the deliveries.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of ArrayList<Integer> where each inner list contains the indices of delivery points assigned to a specific courier.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if couriersNumber is less than 1.

    • createPoints

      private List<org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.DoublePoint> createPoints(double[][] data)
      Converts a two-dimensional array of coordinates into a list of DoublePoint objects suitable for clustering.
      Parameters:
      data - a two-dimensional array where each sub-array represents the coordinates of a delivery point.
      Returns:
      a List of DoublePoint instances corresponding to the delivery points.

    • getAssignedCluster

      private int getAssignedCluster(double[] point, List<org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.CentroidCluster<org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.DoublePoint>> clusters)
      Determines the cluster index to which a specific delivery point belongs.

      This method iterates through the clusters and their points to find a match for the given delivery point coordinates.

      Parameters:
      point - a one-dimensional array representing the coordinates of a delivery point.
      clusters - a list of CentroidCluster<DoublePoint> representing the clustered groups.
      Returns:
      the index of the cluster to which the delivery point belongs, or -1 if not found.
